title: Close Case with Editable Default Values
overview: An #Action Button is configured and placed on the Case Lightning Record Page to close the Case, with Pre-Action: Edit Fields specified. When users click the button, a screen opens with transformed target field values, allowing them to review and edit those values before proceeding with the update.
generalUseCase: Use a Direction-based Executable to define an #Action Button that can be placed on the source objectâ€™s Lightning Record Page. When users click the button, the process takes the current record as the source and can either open a validation screen for users to review and modify transformed target field values before execution or proceed directly with the predefined actions.
